cards.rules_text:
When Miseko Photographer enters, choose a creature or planeswalker card name.
At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if you control another permanent with the chosen name.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Anyone can compose a thousand words, but a picture is much harder to get right.[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 7‎ Blue‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
When Haunted Conspiracist dies, search your library for a Demon card or a black card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put that card in your hand, then shuffle.
{2}{B}: Haunted Conspiracist gets +2/+2 and gains decayed until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 13‎ Black‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Skyscour Pursuant attacks a battle, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of of your first main phase, you may discard a card. If you do, create a Hunt battle token an opponent protects with 2 defense and “When this battle is defeated, draw a card.”

cards.rules_text:
When Kyv's Synthesizer enters, create a Polyp Pools token. [i](It's a kindred land with changeling and “{T}: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Whenever you attack, an attacking creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of permanents you control that shares a creature type with it.

cards.rules_text:
Choose one, then choose another for each card named Unyielding in your graveyard.
• Target creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
• Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token.
• You draw a card and gain 3 life.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.rules_text: Target opponent discards a card and loses 2 life. If you control a superweapon, you draw a card and gain 2 life. [i](Artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker permanents with mana value 5 or greater are superweapons.)[/i]

—Zero Engine, Ironhail Primarch[/i]

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:
Nontoken creatures you control are lands in addition to their other types.

cards.rules_text:

At the beginning of your end step, an opponent chooses a number. When they do, you choose one —
• That opponent loses that much life.
• Draw a card. You lose that much life.

cards.rules_text: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn. When you exile a card this way, add {R}{R}{R} if it's a land. Otherwise, Eldritch Revelation deals damage equal to that card's mana value to any target.

cards.rules_text: Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. [i](If that spell becomes a permanent, it enters under your control.)[/i]
